title: Onions and Clarions - Novel Updates
tags: Clever Protagonist   Economics   Male Protagonist   Politics   Schemes And Conspiracies   Transported to Another World   Wars
author: Suigetsu Hitori   水月一人
description:
A young man, Haru Tajima, wanders into another world while playing a video game. Despite his bewilderment at this magical world, he tries to use his modern knowledge to make a name for himself... but finds that he isn't the first hero from another world. The people are well-fed, well-clothed, well-sheltered, live in prospering towns, and his half-baked knowledge is useless here. So, he resorts to a desperate plan for survival.

'I have a special offer just for you. No, no, it's nothing suspicious. Where I come from, we call it a pyramid scheme...'>
